sql_queries.sql_query: SELECT facility_type AS category, SUM(membership_count) AS value, (SUM(membership_count) * 100.0 / (SELECT SUM(membership_count) FROM gym_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2024)) AS percentage FROM gym_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2024 GROUP BY facility_type ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT facility_type AS category, SUM(membership_count) AS value FROM gym_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE) = 2024 GROUP BY facility_type ORDER BY value DESC;

SELECT facility_type AS category, SUM(membership_count) AS value, (SUM(membership_count) * 100.0 / (SELECT SUM(membership_count) FROM gym_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2024)) AS percentage FROM gym_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2024 GROUP BY facility_type ORDER BY value DESC;

SELECT facility_type AS category, SUM(membership_count) AS value, AVG(SUM(membership_count)) OVER () AS mean_value FROM gym_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2024 GROUP BY facility_type ORDER BY category;
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m') AS time, SUM(membership_count) AS value FROM gym_data WHERE YEAR(date) = 2024 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m')
SELECT facility_type AS category, SUM(membership_count) AS value FROM gym_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE) = 2024 GROUP BY facility_type ORDER BY value DESC;

SELECT facility_type AS category, SUM(membership_count) AS value, (SUM(membership_count) * 100.0 / (SELECT SUM(membership_count) FROM gym_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2024)) AS percentage FROM gym_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2024 GROUP BY facility_type ORDER BY value DESC;

SELECT facility_type AS category, SUM(membership_count) AS value, (SUM(membership_count) * 100.0 / (SELECT SUM(membership_count) FROM gym_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2024)) AS percentage FROM gym_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2024 GROUP BY facility_type ORDER BY value DESC;
